metadata.dcterms:title: Prairie Provinces Historical Newspapers - Metadata Records
metadata.dcterms:creator: University of Alberta Libraries
metadata.dcterms:description: This set contains records for 189 digitized historical newspapers from across the Canadian prairie provinces. Format: MARC
